name: Unlimited Sky Warfare
description:
Originally made by me in 2015, Unlimited Sky Warfare (USW) is a shoot ‘em up (shmup) game that features futuristic warships battle through the sky. There are four types of different enemies each with their own unique traits. The battle will become tougher the more you progress. Defeat the enemies by using either the normal bullet or the cannon.

Controls:

  • WASD - Move
  • Space - Normal shoot
  • Ctrl - Cannon shoot
  • F - Shield
